title: Fairness-Aware Federated Learning Design: Systematic Analysis and Practical Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Machine Learning, Distributed Systems Understanding, and Data Science Experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment using smartphone-based VR simulations, with case-centered education linked to fieldwork tasks.

learning_goals: Fairness concepts in federated learning environments (collaborative fairness, model fairness) can be defined in three or more ways.
Two fairness measurement metrics at the individual/group level can be identified and applied to real-world data.
Three fairness-enhancing techniques (pre-processing, in-processing, post-processing) can be selected to design experiments in a VR simulation environment.
Fairness improvement strategies can be derived using smartphone-based federated learning simulation tools in limited technological environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
